title: 公告问题
author: klacd
txt_content:
为什么我的公告插件只有op能看见？# !!! IMPORTATNT !!!
# The max value of 'Interval' is 461168601842738790 sec.
# The Startuptime is the time that RichAutoMessage waits after the server start before it sends the messages. (Only change this if you are really sure what you are doing!)
# The Starttime is the time that RichAutoMessage waits after the start command before it sends the messages. (Only change this if you are really sure what you are doing!)
normal:
  prefix: '&l[&b&l广播&r&l] '
  suffix: ''
  interval: 120
  random: false
  sendmessages: true
pro:
  startuptime: 20
  starttime: 2
这是配置，插件名字是RichAutoMessage
